EmailTemplate.description: Sent when a case is closed
EmailTemplate.name: Case - Closed Email (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: We’ve resolved your issue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for contacting Hudson’s Bay. We’re happy we were able to assist you in resolving your issue. If you have any more questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us again and refer to case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
CONTACT US NOW
Sincerely, Hudson’s Bay Customer Service
